channel.title: Help with an NPC
channel.description:
Hello,
[U]I put an NPC in the sea. I need it to not be able to move because I want it to stay on the sea so rangers and magers can attack him without moving and come on the beach.[/U]
How do I do that thing though ? I have no idea on how to do it.
My base is Delta.
Thanks !

item.title: Help with an NPC
item.dc:creator: @I_Hope_I I Hope I
item.description:
@I_Hope_I wrote:

Hello,

I put an NPC in the sea. I need it to not be able to move because I want it to stay on the sea so rangers and magers can attack him without moving and come on the beach.

How do I do that thing though ? I have no idea on how to do it.
